problem.p: If the cables are adjusted so that they are perfectly vertical, what is the force, F, in the cable given that the applied load is 2Newtons (2N)?

choicegroup.label: If the cables are adjusted so that they are perfectly horizontal, what is the force in the cable given that the applied load is 2Newtons (2N)?

div.p: Each of the cables will support half of the load in this case.
